DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate dose response base efficacy , safety tolerability bimekizumab subject active psoriatic arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Study Evaluate Dose Response Based Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Bimekizumab Subjects With Active Psoriatic Arthritis Which Type Inflammatory Arthritis .
